info.name: Fresh Platform API
info.description:
Complete API collection for the Fresh Platform - a Georgian AI & Technology platform.

## Authentication
Most endpoints require JWT authentication via Bearer token.

## Setup
1. Set the `BASE_URL` variable to your server (default: http://localhost:3000)
2. Login via `/api/auth/login` to get a token
3. The token will be automatically saved to the `TOKEN` variable

## Georgian Language
Many error messages and content are in Georgian.

body.raw:
{
    "title": "New AI Article",
    "excerpt": "Brief description of the article",
    "content": "Full article content here...",
    "category": "ai-tips",
    "status": "published",
    "tags": ["AI", "Technology"],
    "coverImage": "/uploads/2026/01/cover.jpg"
}

{
    "title": "Test Article",
    "metaTitle": "SEO Optimized Title",
    "metaDescription": "Description for search engines",
    "content": "Article content...",
    "focusKeyword": "AI technology",
    "coverImage": "/image.jpg"
}

{
    "type": "notification",
    "to": "user@example.com",
    "title": "New Article Published",
    "message": "Check out our latest article on AI!",
    "actionUrl": "https://example.com/blog/article",
    "actionText": "Read Now"
}
